greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Matrix inverse of triangle A055134.
mathematica: rows = 12; row[n_] := Join[CoefficientList[(x+n-1)^n + O[x]^(n+1), x], Table[0, {rows-n-1}]]; M = Inverse[Table[row[n], {n, 0, rows-1}]]; Table[ M[[n+1, k+1]], {n, 0, rows-1}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 14 2017 *)
results.author: _Christian G. Bower_, Apr 25 2000
